div.p: SCORIA, or Dross, among metallurgiſts, is the recrement of metals in fuſion; or, more determinately ſpeaking, is that maſs which is produced by melting metals and ores: when cold, it is brittle, and not diſſoluble in water, being properly a kind of glaſs.
